pageContext.description: Made of a thin plate of gold, broken at edges and centre. Shaped like a flat spoon with a thin tang. Ornamented round the outer edge with 3 rows of dots.
pageContext.publications: Proc. Royal Irish Academy XV, Mins. of Procs., p. clxxix.
pageContext.collection: National Museum of Science and Art, Dublin,Plate XVIII 413 18 1876,Purchased with other antiquities from Mr. Walsh of Dromore.
pageContext.museumCollection: National Museum of Science & Art, Dublin
